description: Design for proposed color scheme for the Fountain Court, Minneapolis Instutute of Art
inscription: Inscription in pencil, LC: MINNEAPOLIS MUSEUM / SECTION OF CEILING (DEVELOPED) / & CORNICE SHOWING PROPOSED / COLOR SCHEME / SCALE -- 3/4 INCH = 1\' 0\"
markings: Stamp in violet ink, verso: ROBERSON / OF LONDON / 24, EAST SIXTY-SEVENTH STREET / NEW YORK
medium: Watercolor over graphite on paper, mounted on board
provenance: MIA Archives; transferred to permanent collection, 1999.
title: Minneapolis Museum, Section of Ceiling (Developed) and Cornice Showing Proposed Color Scheme
